com.epimorphics.lda.renderers
Interface RendererFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
Demo_HTML_RendererFactory, JSONRendererFactory, VelocityRendererFactory, XMLRendererFactory, XSLT_RendererFactory
public interface RendererFactory

A RendererFactory can construct a Renderer given an APIEndpoint and a ShortnameService.

Method Summary
 Renderer buildWith(APIEndpoint ep, ShortnameService sns)
          Answer a Renderer constructed to our recipe for the given endpoint and short-name service.
 RendererFactory withMediaType(MediaType mt)
          Answer a new RendererFactory just like this one, but producing renderers that announce the given media type.
 RendererFactory withRoot(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource uri)
          Answer a new RendererFactory just like this one, but with the given Resource for additional properties.
 

Method Detail

buildWith

Renderer buildWith(APIEndpoint ep,
                   ShortnameService sns)
Answer a Renderer constructed to our recipe for the given endpoint and short-name service.

withRoot

RendererFactory withRoot(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource uri)
Answer a new RendererFactory just like this one, but with the given Resource for additional properties.

withMediaType

RendererFactory withMediaType(MediaType mt)
Answer a new RendererFactory just like this one, but producing renderers that announce the given media type.
